content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Plate Production (Position x=0.0 to x=2.0, y=0.0)
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Stone furnace at (0,0) with coal fuel, processing iron ore
- Stone furnace at (2,0) with coal fuel, processing iron ore

###Copper Plate Production (Position x=4.0, y=4.0)
Single stone furnace with coal fuel processing copper ore

###Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position x=6.5 to x=12.5, y=11.5)
Production line consisting of:
- Input chest at (6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving materials from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

###Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to x=-2.5, y=22.5 to y=26.5)
Complete power generation setup:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam pipe network connecting boiler to engine
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

###Research Facility (Position around x=0.5, y=28.5 to y=31.5)
Research setup consisting of:
- Lab (position mentioned in connections but exact coordinates not provided)
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Assembler Resource Shortage Errors
- Ensure consistent supply of copper cables to the electronic circuit assembler
- Monitor and maintain proper ratios of input materials (iron plates and copper cables)

### Coal Supply Management
- Monitor coal levels in burner inserters and boilers to prevent fuel shortages
- Harvest coal before completely running out to maintain continuous operation
- Keep sufficient coal in inventory for refueling operations

### Item Insertion Errors
- Check inventory contents before attempting to insert items
- Ensure proper positioning when inserting items into entities
